FuncDef: The reset msdp all-instance statistics command clears statistics of one or more source active (SA) peers without resetting the MSDP peer (s). The reset msdp all-instance statistics command clears statistics of one or more source active (SA) peers without resetting the MSDP peer (s).

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies IP address of MSDP peer.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
